content.question: The influx of foreign workers alluded to in the passage was most directly the result of which of the following?

choices.label: Technological changes in industrial production that shifted the German economy from manufacturing to services
The period of growth known as the “economic miracle” that occurred after the implementation of the Marshall Plan and postwar reconstruction
The inclusion of West Germany in the new postwar global monetary and trade systems such as the International Monetary Fund and the World Bank
The expansion of West German government spending on welfare state programs such as higher education and health care

content.answer: The period of growth known as the “economic miracle” that occurred after the implementation of the Marshall Plan and postwar reconstruction

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
